title: Base Event Payload
description: The base schema for all event payloads, ensuring they contain essential operational context for processing, security, and observability.

context.title: BasePayloadContext
context.description: The operational context in which the payload was generated.

tenant_id.description: The tenant this payload belongs to. Mandatory for security and data partitioning.

user_id.description: The user associated with this payload.

trace_id.description: The distributed trace ID for end-to-end observability.

session_id.description: The user's session ID, if applicable.

source_event_id.description: The ID of the event that carried this payload, for explicit linkage.

data.description: The specific data for this payload type. This property will be overridden by the inheriting schema.
